item.description:
Let's get together and celebrate the Winter Solstice of 2012 - the special day that the ancient Mayans predicted as the beginning of great transformation for Humanity!

Many people find that art activity is relaxing and soothing. It helps a person dive into

a calming sea of no thoughts and no worries, and become the creator of something beautiful and amazing that your soul has been storing for a long time. That is why art making is one of the most ancient forms of healing. Why not to promote some healing on the solstice celebration day? So...

If you are interested in relaxing your mind while creating beautiful paintings on rocks that can become your inspiration for the upcoming year...

Let's unite our artists' souls on December 21st 

Let's get more connected to our feelings, release some body tension and support our creative side.

Let's rejoice together in a circle of prayer and soul dancing.

There are many ways to enhance your sense of well-being, but with the method of tapping into your creative power through art it’s easier and a lot of fun!

Quick review of the event:

  • Movement for the Soul
  • Rock painting
  • Prayer circle/meditation
  • Tea

At the end, there will be snacks and tea. You are always welcome to bring your own favorite food to share with others. 

Will be provided ~ supplies needed: (rocks, brushes, acrylic paints, gloss, markers, paper        towels and etc.).

Minimum donations for the event: $15
item.name: Winter Solstice Celebration and Rock Painting!
